Title: The Best Leadership Advice of 2022
Description:
Join us as our host, George Kamel, recaps the best leadership advice from this year’s top episodes. Whether 2022 was your best year ever or one you’re glad is over, we hope you feel a sense of accomplishment. You didn’t give up. You didn’t back down. You kept growing, learning and listening. So, here’s to you! Thank you for letting The EntreLeadership Podcast be a part of your journey this year.


You’ll learn:

•      How to confront underperforming employees

•      Why having a problem-solving framework is critical

•      If Jocko Willink takes days off

•      How inconvenience is the key to greatness

•      Why you can’t afford to be an indecisive leader

•      The real reason why people are leaving their jobs

•      The one skill most leaders are never taught

•      Craig Groeschel’s daily habits for crushing goals

•      The biggest barrier to leadership success

•      How to have an uncomfortable conversation with a team member
